q0.question: Who tries to arrest Lex Luthor?
q0.recall: Captain Atom and Luthor's superhero team try to arrest Superman, but Captain Atom later becomes ashamed of his complicity in Luthor's misdeeds. Waller and the military also attempt to arrest Luthor later on.
q0.vectordb: It is not specified who tries to arrest Lex Luthor.
q0.hybrid: Captain Atom and Luthor's superhero team try to arrest Superman, but Captain Atom later becomes ashamed of his complicity in Luthor's misdeeds. Waller and the military also attempt to arrest Luthor later on.

q1.question: Whose murder is charged against Superman?
q1.recall: Metallo's murder is charged against Superman.

q2.question: What was Lex Luthor secretly taking?
q2.answer: ['a serum composed of liquid kryptonite and super steroid Venom']
q2.recall: Lex Luthor was secretly taking a serum composed of liquid kryptonite and super steroid Venom since the last days of the presidential election campaign, making him lose whatever rationality he had left.
q2.vectordb: Lex Luthor was secretly taking a serum composed of liquid kryptonite and super steroid Venom.
q2.hybrid: Lex Luthor was secretly taking a serum composed of liquid kryptonite and super steroid Venom since the last days of the presidential election campaign, making him lose whatever rationality he had left.
